title: Coil - Moon's Milk (In Four Phases) (2002)
description:
---TORRENZIK---
Artist: Coil
Album: Moon's Milk (In Four Phases)
Year: 2002
Label: Eskaton
Cat. Number: ESKATON 23
Genre: Electonic
Style: Nurse With Wound, Experimental
---TRACKLISTING---
---First Phase: Spring Equinox---
1-1	 Moon's Milk Or Under An Unquiet Skull (Part One)	8:29
1-2	 Moon's Milk Or Under An Unquiet Skull (Part Two)	8:09

---Second Phase: Summer Solstice---
1-3	 Bee Stings	4:55
1-4	 Glowworms/Waveforms	5:54
1-5	 Summer Substructures	8:07
1-6.1	 A Warning From The Sun (For Fritz)	10:00
1-6.2	 Amethyst Deceivers (Live In Europe 2001)	6:33

---Third Phase: Autumn Equinox---
2-1	 Regel	1:15
2-2	 Rosa Decidua	4:53
2-3	 Switches	4:43
2-4	 The Auto-Asphyxiating Hierophant	5:55
2-5	 Amethyst Deceivers	6:42

---Fourth Phase: Winter Solstice---
2-6	 A White Rainbow	8:52
2-7	 North	3:46
2-8	 Magnetic North	8:50
2-9	 Christmas Is Now Drawing Near

SIDENOTES: A reissue of the 4 solstice eps on 2 discs. 
The album also has a live version of "Amethyst Deceivers" tagged onto the end of the first disc, following five minutes of silence after "A Warning From The Sun (For Fritz)". The live version of "Amethyst Deceivers" was later released on Live Two, although the Moon's Milk version has a few seconds extra of audience cheering before the audience is welcomed by John Balance saying "thank you".
